Evil Little Dog
hide bio
PM . Follow . Favorite
Joined 06-14-01, id: 80900, Profile Updated: 01-27-14
Author has written 761 stories for Angel, Gatchaman, Buffy: The Vampire Slayer, X-Men: The Movie, Tombstone, X-Files, Fullmetal Alchemist, Dukes of Hazzard, Harry Potter, Starsky and Hutch, Simon and Simon, Saiyuki, StarTrek: The Original Series, Anime X-overs, Misc. Books, Misc. Tv Shows, Lilo & Stitch, Dresden Files, Labyrinth, NCIS, Burn Notice, Doctor Who, In Plain Sight, Being Human, Avatar: Last Airbender, Lost, Star Wars, Big Bang Theory, Up, Covert Affairs, Ironman, Indiana Jones, Last of the Mohicans, Black Sheep Squadron/Baa Baa Black Sheep, Chronicles of Narnia, Looney Tunes, x-men, Strangers In Paradise, His Dark Materials, Avengers, Lord of the Rings, Avengers, Peter Pan, Underdog, Frasier, Leverage, Hunger Games, White Collar, Guardians of the Galaxy, Man From UNCLE, Monkees, Ferris Bueller's Day Off, Mummy, Addams Family, Raven Cycle, Lilo & Stitch, Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure/Bogus Journey, Peanuts, Calvin & Hobbes, Jurassic Park, Lucifer, Last Unicorn, Scorpio Races, How to Train Your Dragon, Beauty and the Beast, Captain America, Sarah Jane Adventures, and Alice in Wonderland.

I am in the process of changing my pen name to the name I use everywhere else, specifically, "Evil_Little_Dog", mostly because I want everything under one name, making it easier for people to find my works.

...you want to find my works, don't you?

In other not-news, if you're looking for the unexpurgated copy of my very long, quite unfinished story, Marking Time, it's in the same place as all my other 'adult' works that FFN looks in askance at, in other words, at Archive of Our Own. You can find me there under the name Evil_Little_Dog.

I'm very proud the novel I first-read for is being published in January, 2014, and if you go pester D. M. Evans here at FFN, I'm sure she'd be happy to tell you all about it, including providing links to purchase.

As for my own original writing, yeah, I really do need to get back to that. Maybe this year. If Ed and Winry will ever shut up.

Convergence by Le Confidant reviews
"Winry…" Why did things had to end the way it did? He shut his eyes against the painful sensation of wanting what he could never have. "It should've been me who'd given you this ring," Edward choked out. Regret, if not remorse, crept up on him. He cursed himself for the direction of his emotions. Edward took Winry's hand in his. "I'm so sorry, Winry—for everything." -A 2003/CoS AU-
